US businesses' fears range from outright piracy of their goods to the transfer of technological know-how that can be inevitable in joint ventures with Chinese companies. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night.`` It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
